Title: Not So Grand Jury
Writer: Robert King (created by), Michelle King (created by), Phil Alden Robinson (created by), William M. Finkelstein, Joey Hartstone (executive story editor), Marcus Dalzine (executive story editor)
Actors: Christine Baranski, Rose Leslie, Erica Tazel, Sarah Steele
Plot: Mike Kresteva takes his case against Reddick, Boseman and Kolstad to a grand jury, but the firm devises a grand jury strategy of their own to hamper Kresteva's efforts. Colin finds himself in an awkward position in court.
